mapper.select:
select , sf.factory_name, sd.dept_name,sr.role_name AS roleName, u.user_name as createUserName, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, bo.organization_name from ocean_v2.sys_user su left join ocean_v2.sys_user u on su.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user s on su.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_factory sf on su.factory_id= sf.factory_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_dept sd on su.dept_id=sd.dept_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user_role sur ON su.user_id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.role_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo ON su.organization_id = bo.organization_id
1=1
and date_format(su.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and su.user_code like CONCAT('%', #{userCode}, '%')
and su.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%')
AND su.user_id IN (SELECT sur.user_id FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id=#{roleId}) AND su.status=1
AND su.user_id NOT IN (SELECT sur.user_id FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id=#{roleId}) AND su.status=1
and su.status=#{status}
AND su.user_id IN (SELECT sou.user_id FROM sys_organization_user sou WHERE sou.org_id=#{organizationId}) AND su.status=1
AND su.user_id NOT IN (SELECT sou.user_id FROM sys_organization_user sou WHERE sou.org_id=#{organizationId}) AND su.status=1
AND su.user_id IN (SELECT bsru.user_id FROM fantech_imes_v2.base_supplier_re_user bsru WHERE bsru.supplier_id=#{supplierId}) AND su.status=1
AND su.user_id NOT IN (SELECT bsru.user_id FROM fantech_imes_v2.base_supplier_re_user bsru WHERE bsru.supplier_id=#{supplierId}) AND su.status=1
group by su.user_id

select sd.dept_id, sd.dept_code, sd.dept_name, sd.dept_desc, sd.factory_id,f.factory_name as factoryName, sd.status, sd.create_user_id,sd.create_time,sd.modified_user_id, sd.modified_time,sd.is_delete from fantech_imes_v2.base_dept sd left join fantech_imes_v2.base_factory f on sd.factory_id=f.factory_id where f.factory_name=#{factoryName} and sd.dept_name=#{deptName}
